Package lib

Class ImageFilter

java.lang.Object
lib.ImageFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
RasterTransformer
public abstract class ImageFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements RasterTransformer
Abstract class that defines the basic ImageFilter. Any Filter for Image Transformations can be implemented by extending this class. Any Sub class extending this class should override either RasterTransformer.transform(ImgRaster, ImgRaster) or RasterTransformer.transformPixel(int) method to provide the filter effect.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> parameters
    HashMap containing filter parameters that can be set using setParameter(String, Object) method.
    static short PROCESS_FROM_ORIGIN_RASTER
    Tells the ImageFilter to transform the original raster.
    static short PROCESS_FROM_PROCESSED_RASTER
    Tells the ImageFilter to transform the already processed raster.

    • ImageFilter

      public ImageFilter()

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public void apply​(ProcessibleImage image, short source)
      Call this method to apply the filter effect on the ProcessibleImage instance provided in parameter.
      Parameters:
      image - ProcessibleImage instance
      source - Constant to decide the raster to be processed. Values must be either PROCESS_FROM_PROCESSED_RASTER or PROCESS_FROM_ORIGIN_RASTER.

    • setParameter

      public void setParameter​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Sets keys on parameters map. Can be used to hold filter specific parameters. For example, in GammaFilter implementation gamma value can be given to the filter as filter.setParameter("GAMMA", 1.0). This parameter value can be then used in transform method definition by calling getParameter(String,Object) method.
      Parameters:
      key - name of the parameter
      value - of the parameter

    • getParameter

      public java.lang.Object getParameter​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object defaultValue)
      Returns the value of the parameter set by setParameter(String,Object) method. If the specified parameter is not found default value is returned. For example, filter.getParameter("GAMMA", 1.0) returns the value of GAMMA parameter if set otherwise 1.0.
      Parameters:
      key - of the parameter.
      defaultValue - default value to be returned if the parameter is not found.
      Returns:
      the value of the parameter requested
